data.message: That stupid dress got me again.  It looked white and changed to blue before my very eyes. LoL

replies.message: Hey!!!! Facebook Administrators, I am continuing to majorly complain that I've been experiencing a tremendous multitude of horrendous dilemmas{Technical-Difficulties, etc.) this year. Additionally my personal list of Facebook related problematic circumstances, which consist of: Newsfeed-Glitches, Album/Photos-Disappearances, Login-Trauma. BTW other "Facebook PROBLEMS" are centered around nightmarish bugs that are inflicting various big issues towards the many functions across this whole website. Anyway Facebook Administrators, I really need Facebook to address the specified things entirely mentioned today{December.23,2015) concerning what I've encountered . Lastly Facebook Administrators, "PLEASE" can U seriously help{SOS) me out by directly providing a urgent resolution{FIXES, etc.) able to remedy those "Big Troubles" stated in this current message.

Your Account is Temporarily Locked
We’ve detected suspicious activity on your Facebook account and have temporarily locked it as a security precaution.
It’s likely that your account was compromised as a result of entering your password on a website designed to look like Facebook. This type of attack is known as phishing. Learn more in the Help Center.
Over the next few steps we’ll walk you through a security check to help secure your account, and let you log back in.
hi facebook adminhelp me how to unlock fb account of my brother .
